```{r}
{
  pacman::p_load(
    here,
    janitor,viridis,
    tidyverse,
    cowplot,
    patchwork,
    RColorBrewer) 
  
  theme_set(theme_cowplot())
}
```

# Data

## C16

```{r}

C16Map_df <- read_csv(here("data","C16Map.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  rename(y=x1,
         x=x2,
         z=x3) %>% 
  select(-x6)

C16Trace_df <- read_csv(here("data","C16Trace.csv"),col_names = FALSE) %>% 
  rename(y=X1,
         x=X2,
         z=X3,
         dist=X4,
         mg_ca=X5,
         st_dev=X6)

C16Trace_df %>% 
  ggplot()+
  aes(dist,mg_ca,col=log(mg_ca))+
  geom_point(show.legend = FALSE)+
  scale_color_viridis(option="G",begin=0.01)
  



C16Map_df %>%
  ggplot() +
  aes(x,
      y,
      col = log(mg_ca)) +
  geom_point(size = 0.2) +
  scale_color_viridis(option = "G",
                      begin = 0.01) +
  coord_fixed() +
  geom_path(data = C16Trace_df,
            aes(x = x, y = y),
            col = "red",
            linetype="dashed",
            size=0.7)



```
